quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates
tweet: Examine life, make it worth living 🧐

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I think therefore I am.
author: René Descartes

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: The only thing I know is that I know nothing.
author: Socrates
tweet: Knowing nothing, the path to wisdom 🌌

quote: Happiness is not an ideal of reason, but of imagination.
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Liberty consists in doing what one desires.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: Man is born free, and everywhere he is in chains.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau
tweet: Born free, seek to break the chains ⛓️

quote: The life of man is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish, and short.
author: Thomas Hobbes

quote: One cannot step twice into the same river.
author: Heraclitus
tweet: Life's constant change, like a river 🏞️

quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
author: Plato

quote: It is undesirable to believe a proposition when there is no ground whatever for supposing it true.
author: Bertrand Russell
tweet: Belief without reason, a risky path 🛤️

quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
author: Alan Watts

quote: To understand everything is to forgive everything.
author: Osho

quote: The aim of art is to represent not the outward appearance of things, but their inward significance.
author: Aristotle

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: I can control my passions and emotions if I can understand their nature.
author: Spinoza

quote: The only way to deal with an unfree world is to become so absolutely free that your very existence is an act of rebellion.
author: Albert Camus
tweet: Absolute freedom, an act of rebellion 🕊️

quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay
tweet: Invent the future, shape your destiny ⚙️

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: Wisdom begins in wonder.
author: Socrates

quote: A thing is not necessarily true because a man dies for it.
author: Oscar Wilde
tweet: Truth is not validated by sacrifice 🎭

quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
author: Buddha
tweet: Save yourself, walk your own path 🛤️

quote: You can discover more about a person in an hour of play than in a year of conversation.
author: Plato

quote: We are what our thoughts have made us; so take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; they travel far.
author: Swami Vivekananda
tweet: Thoughts shape us, choose them wisely 🌐

quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
author: Lao Tzu
tweet: Letting go, the way to become 🌻

quote: Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Man does not control his own fate. The women in his life do that for him.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Out of your vulnerabilities will come your strength.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: We are more often frightened than hurt; and we suffer more from imagination than from reality.
author: Seneca

quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
